Translations.Text: Ai lie fu, lia mu, mi mu.
zuijin di difang. Tamen ji bai zhihou, jiang huo shengli,
yu shu nian zhi jian. Yiqian he yihou, fanshi guizhenzhu zhuchi. Zai na ri, xindao de ren jiangyao huanxi.
Zhe shi youyu zhenzhu de yuanzhu, ta yuanzhu tasuo yiyu zhe. Ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
Zhenzhu yingxu (tamen shengli), zhenzhu bing bushuang yue, dan renmen daban bu zhidao.
Tamen zhi zhidao jinshi shenghuo de biaomian, tamen duiyu houshi, shi shuhu de.
Nandao tamen meiyou siwei ma? Zhenzhu chuangzao tiandi wanwu, zhi yi zhenli he dingqi, you xuduo ren dique bu xin jiang yu tamen de zhu xiang hui.

Nandao tamen meiyou zai da dishang luxing er guancha qian ren de jieju shi zenyang de ma? Qian ren bi tamen nuli geng da, qian ren yu difang de ken zhi he jianshe, shengguo tamen. Tamen zu zhong de shizhe ceng gei tamen dai lai xuduo mingzheng, gu zhen zhu wei kui wang tamen, dan tamen kui wangle ziji,
ranhou e bao nai zuo'e zhe de jieju, yinwei tamen fouren zhen zhu de jixiang, erqie jiayi chaoxiao.
